subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Box12 audio malfunction.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Work horoscope.


"August 6, 2007
Think twice before you proceed on an old idea. Cutting-edge information will 
come your way today that will cause you to consider a new approach. Take 
this new approach seriously. It is not something that you should 
automatically discard. Consider it."

Frank-S



>From: "Frank Sumption" <franks-boxes@...>
>Reply-To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Box12 audio malfunction.
>Date: Mon, 06 Aug 2007 12:22:36 -0600
>
>Not quite a malfunction, the AM side is putting out about twice the signal
>as the FM, so on loud stations there's enough audio out of the monitor
>speaker to cause feedback. I put an attenuator on the output of the AM
>tuner, which helps.
>
>It's the type of voices that gets to me sometimes, how many times to I have
>listen to crackhead aliens saying they're coming to pick up their Purple
>Princess!?  I think the purpose of EVP is make us nutz! Or maybe I need 
>some
>of Art Bell's Gray Away Spray!?
>
>Frank-S
>

>
